message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is fair and saves us both from losing money to inflation.
I think this is a more reasonable split, considering we both want to avoid losing value to inflation.
Bob, this is as low as I can go. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains even more.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more than you're offering. Inflation is hurting me more than you.
